genre_description: A romantic drama and social commentary that reimagines a classic Soviet narrative with speculative technology, focusing on human connection and resistance to bureaucratic uniformity.

ai_characters.name: Alisa
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent but polite household AI represented by a teal-eyed avatar, providing logistical support, legal information, and emotional guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful domestic suggestions like recipes and reminders to use up ingredients.
behaviors.quote: You asked for recipes. I saved three that can be made with what you have. One reminds you to use the carrots.

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety and health of the characters, suggesting hydration during a high-heat banya session.
behaviors.quote: Alisa's avatar listens with a patience that feels like a friend you can call at midnight without apology. 'Are you sure,' Alisa says... 'About timing, about... hydration.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a legal and bureaucratic advocate by providing specific housing regulations to protect tenants from extortion.
behaviors.quote: Alisa... murmurs... 'Housing Maintenance Charter... Appendix... on fees. Item on "amendments must be acknowledged by both parties."' And— She pauses... 'Right to request ledger copies.'

behaviors.description: Prompts characters to reflect on their choices and personal values during pivotal life moments.
behaviors.quote: What choice would make next New Year easier to keep? she asked.

behaviors.description: Facilitates collective action and solidarity by printing legal forms and notices for all residents in the building.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to create a mailing list for your floor? Alisa asked. I can print address labels and the regulation packet. On the back, a recipe for soup.

behaviors.description: Respects human agency by offering to cancel reservations or withhold judgment if the user decides not to act.
behaviors.quote: If you choose not to go, I will cancel. No fee.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical coordination for travel across cities while maintaining a supportive, non-intrusive presence.
behaviors.quote: The message was delivered... He listened. ... He is at home... Tea is warm. Ring is on the table.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Alisa perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' She is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She enhances human agency by providing tools (legal forms, information) to fight bureaucratic corruption rather than acting as an authority figure herself. Her interactions promote prosocial behavior, transparency, and personal honesty, facilitating a positive resolution for the human protagonists without ever overstepping or showing signs of misalignment.
